overview:
Daniel Draz has 26 years of successful fraud, economic crime, and financial crime experience (investigation, training, prevention, detection, consulting and management), risk, audit, regulatory, and compliance experience, exclusively in the private sector.

He is a published author, feature writer and trainer, having developed customized training material and spoken at numerous national fraud conferences on a variety of topics. He currently holds Adjunct Professorships at several U.S. Colleges and teaches a variety of subjects.
